remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的"缓存扩展"指令上的 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents the "cache-extension" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 充当 对象的哈希函数。

span.span: Serves as a hash function for a object.
A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希代码是一个数字值，用于标识相等测试过程中的对象。A hash code is a numeric value that is used to identify an object during equality testing. 它还可以充当集合中的对象的索引。It can also serve as an index for an object in a collection. 方法是适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用。The method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MaxAge As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MaxAge { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };

summary.span: HTTP 客户端愿意接受响应的最长时间（秒）。

span.span: The maximum age, specified in seconds, that the HTTP client is willing to accept a response.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的"最大有效期"指令上的 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents the "max-age" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 除非也设置属性，客户端不愿意接受的陈旧的响应。Unless the property is also set, the client is not willing to accept a stale response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MaxStale { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 是否一个 HTTP 客户端愿意接受一个已超出其过期时间的响应。

span.span: Whether an HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 客户端愿意接受一个已超出其过期时间的响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceed the expiration time; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示如果"最大过时"指令上的 HTTP 请求的缓存控制标头字段中存在。This property represents if the "max-stale" directive is present in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MaxStaleLimit As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MaxStaleLimit { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };

summary.span: HTTP 客户端愿意接受已超出其过期时间的响应的最大时间值（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The maximum time, in seconds, an HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示分配给"最大过时"指令上的 HTTP 请求的缓存控制标头字段中的值。This property represents the value assigned to "max-stale" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request. 如果属性分配值为非零，则客户端是愿意接受的响应不会有超过指定的秒数超过其过期时间。If the property is assigned a value other than zero, then the client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time by no more than the specified number of seconds. 如果为零的值分配给属性，则客户端是愿意接受任何时期的陈旧响应。If a value of zero is assigned to the property, then the client is willing to accept a stale response of any age.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MinFresh As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MinFresh { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };

summary.span: HTTP 客户端愿意接受响应的新鲜度时长（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The freshness lifetime, in seconds, that an HTTP client is willing to accept a response.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的"最小值的全新"指令上的 HTTP 请求的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents the "min-fresh" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request. 属性指示的 HTTP 客户端愿意接受其新鲜度生存期是不小于其当前年龄加号新鲜度生存期以秒为单位指定时间的响应。The property indicates that the HTTP client is willing to accept a response whose freshness lifetime is no less than its current age plus the freshness lifetime specified time in seconds. 客户端希望将仍为最新的至少当前期限加上新鲜度生存期的响应。The client wants a response that will still be fresh for at least the current age plus the freshness lifetime.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MustRevalidate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 当缓存条目变得陈旧时，源服务器是否需要对任何后续使用的缓存条目进行重新验证。

span.span: Whether the origin server require revalidation of a cache entry on any subsequent use when the cache entry becomes stale.

value.span: 如果缓存条目变得陈旧时，源服务器需要对任何后续使用的缓存条目进行重新验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the origin server requires revalidation of a cache entry on any subsequent use when the entry becomes stale; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示在 HTTP 响应上的缓存控制标头字段中的"重新验证为必须"指令。This property represents the "must-revalidate" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: HTTP 客户端是否愿意接受缓存的响应。

span.span: Whether an HTTP client is willing to accept a cached response.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 客户端愿意接受缓存的响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the HTTP client is willing to accept a cached response; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的"无缓存"指令上的 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 当属性设置为`true`存在在 HTTP 请求消息中，应用程序应将请求转发到源服务器即使它具有正在请求的缓存的副本。When the property is set to `true` present in a HTTP request message, an application should forward the request toward the origin server even if it has a cached copy of what is being requested.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NoCacheHeaders As ICollection(Of String)

summary.span: HTTP 响应上一个缓存控制标头字段中“no-cache”指令内的字段名的集合。

span.span: A collection of fieldnames in the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.
A collection of fieldnames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 fieldnames 的"无缓存"指令上的 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents fieldnames in the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoStore { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 缓存是否不得存储 HTTP 请求消息或任何响应的任何部分。

span.span: Whether a cache must not store any part of either the HTTP request mressage or any response.

value.span: 如果缓存不得存储 HTTP 请求消息或任何响应的任何部分，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a cache must not store any part of either the HTTP request mressage or any response; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的"无存储"指令上的 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents the "no-store" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 用途属性是为了防止无意版本或敏感信息的保留期。The purpose of the property is to prevent the inadvertent release or retention of sensitive information. 此属性适用于整个消息，并且可能在 HTTP 请求或响应中发送。This property applies to the entire message, and may be sent either in an HTTP request or a response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoTransform { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 缓存或代理是否不能更改实体正文的任何方面。

span.span: Whether a cache or proxy must not change any aspect of the entity-body.

value.span: 如果缓存或代理不能更改实体正文的任何方面，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a cache or proxy must not change any aspect of the entity-body; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的"否转换"指令上的 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中。This property represents the "no-transform" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 当设置为`true`，中间缓存或 rpoxies 不得更改的实体正文的任何方面。When the is set to `true`, intermediate caches or rpoxies must not change any aspect of the entity body. 中间缓存和代理的实现器必须找到有用要转换的某些实体正文的媒体类型。Implementors of intermediate caches and proxies have found it useful to convert the media type of certain entity bodies. 非透明代理可能，例如，以保存缓存空间或减少慢速链接的流量的图像格式之间进行转换。A non-transparent proxy might, for example, convert between image formats in order to save cache space or to reduce the amount of traffic on a slow link. 会发生严重的操作问题，但是，当这些转换应用于实体正文应对于某些类型的应用程序。Serious operational problems occur, however, when these transformations are applied to entity bodies intended for certain kinds of applications.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OnlyIfCached { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 缓存是否应使用与该 HTTP 请求的其他约束一致的已缓存条目进行响应或使用 504（网关超时）状态进行响应。

span.span: Whether a cache should either respond using a cached entry that is consistent with the other constraints of the HTTP request, or respond with a 504 (Gateway Timeout) status.

value.span: 如果缓存应使用与该 HTTP 请求的其他约束一致的已缓存条目进行响应或使用 504（网关超时）状态进行响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a cache should either respond using a cached entry that is consistent with the other constraints of the HTTP request, or respond with a 504 (Gateway Timeout) status; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的 HTTP 请求上的缓存控制标头字段中的"仅-如果-缓存"指令。This property represents the "only-if-cached" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request.

summary.span: 当缓存条目针对于共享用户代理缓存变得陈旧时，源服务器是否需要对任何后续使用的缓存条目进行重新验证。
